channel.title: Spawn Points+more [READ REALLY BASIC PLZ HELP]
channel.description:
Hey guys, Thanks for viewing my thread. I need 3 very basic things explained to me. Please don't flame me saying this is easy stuff and you should do it yourself. It's just pointless
I need the following things explained.
1.The spawn points when you first login or die. I need to change these spawn points. I know it has somthing todo with the x and y co-ords 2.The java file were u edit the NPC's speech (i forgot) 3.My server source came with resets. So if you lag and get a dc it could reset your account,making you level 3 again. I think it has somthing to do with the more info file (not saving it)
~thanks dr4g0n sc1m

item.title: Spawn Points+more [READ REALLY BASIC PLZ HELP]
item.dc:creator: @mrslayer mrslayer
item.description:
@mrslayer wrote:

here is how you change where you spawn when you die
ok first go to client.java and look for sendMessage("Oh dear you died!");
then you should get something like this teleportToX = 3254; teleportToY = 3420; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you died!"); hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; just change the teleport x and y to where ever you want to respawn when you die gl with your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Spawn Points+more [READ REALLY BASIC PLZ HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

Hmm…Not sure. Here’s what you do:
Die, and don’t move. Type ::coordson
Then go into client.java and search the first number. If you get nothing, try player.java.

Read full topic
